Name: Honolulu Cocktail No. 1
Ingredients: 10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Nick & Nora glass .
Prepare garnish of pineapple wedge skewered with Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Garnish with pineapple wedge on rim skewered maraschino cherry.
Review: Gin is hardly Hawaiian, but its botanical bite sits well in this tropically fruity cocktail.
History: Adapted from a recipe in Harry Craddock 's 1930 The Savoy Cocktail Book .
Nutrition: One serving of Honolulu Cocktail No. 1 contains 143 calories
